column1: Local Foods////Now the Chicken was grilled
column2: with I think it was chips on top to make it "Crunchy Chicken". It was loaded with tomatoes
column4: and lettuce (so healthy and so fresh) the cream cheese melted well keeping the crunch in place. Now when I bit into this delightful sandwich
column5: this would also be the first pretzel bun I've ever had. The first bite was perfect it had: crunch
column8: and the chicken was oh so moist. If it was good customized
column9: I can only imagine how the original "Crunchy Chicken" taste for others.
